column1: Kata Robata////We started out with the ceviche appetizer
column2: which was appropriately bright and refreshing. Next came the Brussels sprouts: flash fried
column5: which was appreciated. My favorite appetizer was the Fish and Fish - this reminded me of my childhood
column6: when all of the fish prepared for us by my mom was still on the bone. The flesh was moist and tender
column7: and slurping the fatty pieces from the bones was a nostalgic treat.
